problem_text_cn: 如图,⊙O的半径为5cm,圆心到弦AB的距离为3cm,则弦AB的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is N_0, the distance from the center of the circle to chord AB is N_1, then the length of chord AB is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:连接OA,∵⊙O的半径为5cm,圆心到弦AB的距离为3cm,∴OA=5cm,OC=3cm,且OC⊥AB,∴AB=2AC,在Rt△OAC中,AC=√{OA²-OC²}=4(cm),∴AB=8cm．
raw_comment: 此题考查了垂径定理以及勾股定理．
